name: Mahjong Ultimate Free
description:
The ancient solitaire Mahjong matching game at it's finest!

Ask the computer to reveal the best moves. Backup moves and retry the same game different ways. Play guaranteed winnable or totally random games. Keep track of your playing time and other game stats.

WARNING: This game is addictive!

The FREE version Mahjong Solitaire features unlimited play of the classic Mahjong layout.

Features:

* Unlimited play of the classic layout
* Computer hints feature
* Backup moves button
* Soothing soundtrack

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
